title: Manchester/Victoria-Shopping District
name: Sachas Hotel
price: From Â£26 for a single room

reviews.content: The Hotel Grande Canal is a beautiful hotel with a great location. We stayed there prior to a cruise. The staff was very helpful and friendly. We arrived at Marco Polo Aeroport...took a bus ( right out in front of the terminal 3Euros) to Piazzale Roma (about 10 min) Then took the Vaporetto to our hotel (second stop). We bought a 48 hr vaporetto pass for 28 euros which allowed us to get around quite easily. When it was time to go to the cruise ship...we were able to take the Vaporetto right to the mooring. The location of the hotel was very quiet and being so close to the Vaporetto we were able to move around Venice quickly.
reviews.author: Holden Heathcote

description: The Britannia Sachas is a popular hotel located near Manchester city centre. Its Tripadvisor reviews page makes for famously entertaining reading.
